Description: 
This application implements a command called "WinFormSample"  to demonstrate the use of the WinForm dialog.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "DotNetSamples.sln"ï¼Œthen build the application.

To use WinFormSample.dll:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing and draw some entities.
2. Run NETLOAD command and load the WinFormSample.dll file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "WinFormSample" command and click the "Select entity" button on the dialog box to select a entity, and the dialog box will display the basic information of the selected entity.
